NTLM authentication is unsecure and should be avoided.

Since: 8.0

Sender that sends a message via a WebService based on NTLM authentication.
See also
Github - WebServiceNtlmSender Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.http.WebServiceNtlmSender
Syntax
Copy
<WebServiceNtlmSender />
Attributes
Required

This component has no required attributes

Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
contentType	text	text/html; charset=utf-8
Content-type of the request
url	text	-
Url or base of url to be used
timeout	number	10000
Timeout in ms of obtaining a connection/result. 0 means no timeout
maxConnections	number	10
The maximum number of concurrent connections
authAlias	text	-
Alias used to obtain credentials for authentication to host
